name: Project Magdump
description:
You start off with nothing but a tiny pocket pistol which has the accuracy of an eggplant and you have to destroy as many targets as possible using whatever method you find comfortable, there is no time limit, health bar or game over to worry about so take all the time you need.

  • Upgrade your gun's damage, reload speed, accuracy, mag size or fire rate to their absolute max or hire and upgrade sentry turrets to do the work for you. 
  • Customize the look of your gun using parts given to you buy destroying unique boss targets. Go forth and make creations of gun beauty or abomination!
  • Unlock additional guns with their own unique upgrades and customization options like a shotgun by prestiging (Currently only 3 guns available but there's more to come)

New content updates like new guns, bug fixes, balances are always in the works so if there are any issues or concerns please let me know.
